title: This is title
content:
JOB DESCRIPTION:

We are hiring from Middle to Senior levels:

  • Optimizing components for consistency and performance across desktops, tablets, and mobiles. 
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop and ship new features. 
  • Optimize the system for reliability and performance. 
  • Fix bugs and improve the system. 
  • Write unit test code to prevent similar bugs and responsible for resolving bugs as soon as possible. 
  • Provide methodology and metrics to monitor the system. 
  • Improve performance, the reliability of the system. 
  • Contribute knowledge to the technical team. 

REQUIREMENTS:

  • 3+ years of experience as a Backend Developer (Golang is a big plus).
  • Fluency and understanding of any specific programming language (Java, PHP, Python, C/C++, NodeJS,...). Willing to work with, or switch to Golang.
  • Experience with two or more of these following data systems: MongoDB, MySQL, Postgres, ElasticSearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Kafka, Cassandra. 
  • Experience with Microservices, event-driven architecture (a plus). 
  • Good understanding and knowledge of OOP, data structure, design patterns. 
  • Self-motivated to explore new technologies, applications, and environments. 
  • Can work in both independent and teamwork environments.
